overview: DIR EN GREY, celebrating their 25th anniversary this year, will present a documentary film "DIR EN GREY - UROBOROS the Movie" on M-ON! The documentary film "DIR EN GREY - UROBOROS the Movie," which records their legendary live performance at Nippon Budokan in Tokyo on January 9 and 10, 2010, as well as behind-the-scenes footage, will be broadcast on M-ON! on!
title: 劇場版DIR EN GREY -UROBOROS-
